snippet.title: HEART-LUNG MACHINE - Official Trailer - VR Horror Game
snippet.description:
Nov. 11 2024 on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3103480/HeartLung_Machine/
HEART-LUNG MACHINE is an intense horror game that focuses on delivering an immersive VR experience. Trapped in an abandoned underground complex, you stumble upon unspeakable horrors. To make matters worse, something is stalking you in the darkness. Hide!
